lead_paragraph: Immunotherapy drugs have been hailed as a breakthrough in cancer treatment, but doctors are finding that what makes them effective is also what poses serious risks.

headline.print_headline: Therapies That Can Attack Cancer, and Organs
headline.main: Immune System, Unleashed by Cancer Therapies, Can Attack Organs

snippet: Immunotherapy drugs have been hailed as a breakthrough in cancer treatment, but doctors are finding that what makes them effective is also what poses serious risks....
abstract: Immunotherapy drugs that are being hailed as breakthrough in cancer treatment pose risk of stimulating immune system to attack healthy, vital organs along with cancer cells; oncologists and immunologists urge medical field to remain vigilant as drugs soar in popularity (Series: Cell Wars).
